link_desc:
Raspberry Pi CPU extras

Items:
- CPU clock
- CPU voltage
- CPU temperature (Celsius)
- CPU throttling

CPU items interval: 1m

Triggers:
- CPU temperature is high(<70C)
- CPU is throttling

Installation:
1. clone or download https://gitlab.com/Qrl/zabbix
2. copy the userparameter_rpi.conf to /etc/zabbix/zabbix_agentd.d/
3. Add zabbix user to video group
$ sudo usermod -a -G video zabbix
4. restart the zabbix agent
5. import zbx_template_rpi.xml to your templates in Zabbix UI
author: qrl
